channel.title: Posts on Avarus Invidia
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Avarus Invidia

item.description: title: “Night Thoughts” date: 2022-02-01T21:01:17+01:00 draft: true The pizza today was great Overly stressed I indulged myself in a Mezzo/Mezzo pizza, one side being a quattro formaggi (four cheese) and the other one being bussola (ham and shrimp). And now I’m contemplating nothing. Head empty, no thoughts.
